response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, is worth $1,500,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $1,250,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth while also allowing you to make a significant saving compared to its market value. I am confident that this investment will bring you substantial benefits and returns. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's anything else I can provide to help you make your decision.", "product_price": 1250000}
